title: About Me
subtitle: Get to know the person behind the creativity
description: Welcome to my digital space! I'm passionate about photography, music, and creating immersive experiences in virtual worlds.

photography.title: Photography
photography.description: I specialize in VRChat photography, capturing unique moments and creative scenes in virtual environments.

music.title: Music
music.description: Music is my passion. I create and curate tracks that inspire and energize.

creativity.title: Creativity
creativity.description: Always exploring new ways to express creativity through digital art and virtual experiences.
